inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD sampling speed
inputParameter.name: atwd_sampling_speed_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD Ramp Top Voltage
inputParameter.name: atwd_ramp_top_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD Ramp Bias current
inputParameter.name: atwd_ramp_bias_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD Pedestal Voltage
inputParameter.name: atwd_pedestal_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting for ATWD 1st stage output clamping
inputParameter.name: atwd_ch0_clamp

inputParameter.description: Selects one of two chips (A or B) on the board:0=ATWD-A and 1=ATWD-B
inputParameter.name: atwd_chip_a_or_b

inputParameter.description: Selects one of 3 PMT analog signal channels with different gains
inputParameter.name: atwd_channel

inputParameter.description: Selects ATWD launch method: 0=forced trigger, 1=SPE discriminator trigger
inputParameter.name: atwd_trig_forced_or_spe

outputParameter.description: Number of ATWD counts per volt
outputParameter.name: half_range_counts_per_volt

outputParameter.description: Number of ATWD counts per volt
outputParameter.name: full_range_counts_per_volt

outputParameter.description: Percent variation of the slope (count/volts) from 1/2 to full range
outputParameter.name: linearity_pedestal_percent

outputParameter.description: pedestal value in atwd counts for all pedestal settings
outputParameter.name: atwd_pedestal_sweep_forced
